description: This file provides utility methods for serializing and deserializing Flutter Color objects to and from primitive representations such as integers and hex strings. It facilitates converting Colors to integer values, hex strings, and parsing these representations back into Color objects, primarily for persistence and data interchange.

classes.name: ColorSerialization
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to serialize and deserialize Color objects for storage and transmission.

methods.name: toInt
methods.description: Converts a Color object into its ARGB integer representation.

methods.name: fromInt
methods.description: Creates a Color object from an integer value, defaulting to transparent if null.

methods.name: toHex
methods.description: Converts a Color to its hex string representation, including alpha channel, e.g., #FF2563EB.

methods.name: fromHex
methods.description: Parses a hex string into a Color object, handling strings with or without a leading '#' and with 6 or 8 hex characters.
